entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1206 warns on platforms that should be vaild when project has no `FrameworkReference` #34003
  • Implicit using for console apps and ASP.NET Core don't match #33997
  • Cannot restore dotnet 7 csproj due to missing nuget package in WSL #33982

Closed

  • NativeAOT StripSymbols should allow options for what to do with the symbol file #33476
    Backlog
  • Certificate trust list needs to be backported to 6.0.3xx (and maybe 6.0.1xx) #33928

PullRequests

Created

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • VS Shortcut: Use version number file #33938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33926
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • First-run: Minor code adjustments #33935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ProcessFrameworkReferences if ILLink pack is required #33062
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update default TrimMode for WebSDK projects #33962
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers
